title: Stop Murder, Stop Violence, Appeals Bangladesh Army Chief After Taking Over
content: End violence, will meet your demands, said Bangladesh's army chief Waker-Uz-Zaman Monday to protesters, adding that he will form an interim government after prime minister Sheikh Hasina resigned and fled the capital.
summary: End violence, will meet your demands, said Bangladesh's army chief Waker-Uz-Zaman Monday to protesters, adding that he will form an interim government after prime minister Sheikh Hasina resigned and fled the capital.

title: Bangladeshi Protesters Vandalise Sheikh Mujibur Rahman's Statue
content: Hundreds of thousands of Bangladeshi protesters defied curfew and stormed the Prime Minister's palace in capital Dhaka after reports surfaced that Sheikh Hasina has resigned and left the country.
summary: Hundreds of thousands of Bangladeshi protesters defied curfew and stormed the Prime Minister's palace in capital Dhaka after reports surfaced that Sheikh Hasina has resigned and left the country.

title: Who Is Sheikh Hasina Who Once Saved Bangladesh From Military Rule
content: Sheikh Hasina once helped rescue Bangladesh from military rule, but her time in power has seen the mass arrest of her political opponents and human rights sanctions against her security forces.
summary: Sheikh Hasina once helped rescue Bangladesh from military rule, but her time in power has seen the mass arrest of her political opponents and human rights sanctions against her security forces.

title: Sheikh Hasina Quits After Bangladesh Army's 45-Min Notice: Top Developments
content: Sheikh Hasina quit as Prime Minister of Bangladesh and fled the nation Monday afternoon following violent clashes that have killed over 300 people so far. The Bangladesh army reportedly gave the long-serving Prime Minister 45 minutes to quit.
summary: Sheikh Hasina quit as Prime Minister of Bangladesh and fled the nation Monday afternoon following violent clashes that have killed over 300 people so far. The Bangladesh army reportedly gave the long-serving Prime Minister 45 minutes to quit.

title: Bangladesh PM Sheikh Hasina Quits, Army Coup Amid Massive Protests
content: Sheikh Hasina has resigned as Bangladesh Prime Minister and fled the country amid violent clashes between her party Awami League's supporters and protesters demanding that she quit, news agency Reuters has reported.
summary: Sheikh Hasina has resigned as Bangladesh Prime Minister and fled the country amid violent clashes between her party Awami League's supporters and protesters demanding that she quit, news agency Reuters has reported.

title: US Eyes Indian Ocean Island As Possible Military Base To Deter China
content: A remote Australian island close to an Indian Ocean chokepoint for Chinese oil shipments is on a list of possible locations for US military construction aimed at deterring China, with the US saying it "may or may not" support American forces.
summary: A remote Australian island close to an Indian Ocean chokepoint for Chinese oil shipments is on a list of possible locations for US military construction aimed at deterring China, with the US saying it "may or may not" support American forces.

title: French Climber Achieves Fastest-Ever Ascent Of K2, Credits Patience
content: French mountaineer Benjamin Vedrines counted every second as he made history's fastest-ever ascent of K2, but says he doesn't add up the growing number of records to his name.
summary: French mountaineer Benjamin Vedrines counted every second as he made history's fastest-ever ascent of K2, but says he doesn't add up the growing number of records to his name.

title: LIVE: Sheikh Hasina Quits As Bangladesh PM Amid Massive Unrest, Say Reports
content: Uncertainty looms over the future of Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina after Bangladesh witnessed one of its deadliest days. Tens of thousands of protesters have hit the streets and clashed with cops, demanding Hasina's resignation.
summary: Uncertainty looms over the future of Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina after Bangladesh witnessed one of its deadliest days. Tens of thousands of protesters have hit the streets and clashed with cops, demanding Hasina's resignation.

title: "Your Duty Is...": Sheikh Hasina's Son To Bangladesh Army Amid Clashes
content: The son of Bangladesh's Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina on Monday urged the country's security forces to block any takeover from her rule as hundreds of thousands of protesters demanded she quit.
summary: The son of Bangladesh's Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina on Monday urged the country's security forces to block any takeover from her rule as hundreds of thousands of protesters demanded she quit.

title: Meta Is Offering Hollywood Stars Millions For AI Voice Projects
content: Negotiations between Meta and some talent representatives have stopped and started many times because the parties can't agree on terms for use of the actors' voices.
summary: Negotiations between Meta and some talent representatives have stopped and started many times because the parties can't agree on terms for use of the actors' voices.

title: Bangladesh Protesters Storm Sheikh Hasina's Palace Amid Violent Clashes
content: Bangladesh Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina has resigned and left the capital Dhaka amid violent protests demanding her resignation, a source close to the embattled leader told the news agency AFP.
summary: Bangladesh Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina has resigned and left the capital Dhaka amid violent protests demanding her resignation, a source close to the embattled leader told the news agency AFP.

title: Man Who Forced Son To Run On Treadmill, Causing His Death Gets 25 Years Jail
content: A New Jersey father has been sentenced to 25 years in prison for abusing his 6-year-old son to death.
summary: A New Jersey father has been sentenced to 25 years in prison for abusing his 6-year-old son to death.

title: Israeli Strike Kills 2 In Lebanon Amid Growing Middle East Tensions
content: Lebanon's health ministry said two people were killed Monday in an Israeli strike on the country's south, where Hezbollah has been trading near-daily fire with Israel since the start of the Gaza war in October.
summary: Lebanon's health ministry said two people were killed Monday in an Israeli strike on the country's south, where Hezbollah has been trading near-daily fire with Israel since the start of the Gaza war in October.

title: Air India Cancels Israel Flights. Which Other Airlines Have Also Stopped?
content: Several international airlines unsettled by the threat of a multi-front war in the Middle East - following Iran-Israel tension, to add to the violence in Gaza, which has impacted neighbouring countries, like Lebanon - have cancelled or cut flights.
summary: Several international airlines unsettled by the threat of a multi-front war in the Middle East - following Iran-Israel tension, to add to the violence in Gaza, which has impacted neighbouring countries, like Lebanon - have cancelled or cut flights.

title: UK PM Keir Starmer Calls For Emergency Meet As Riots Intensify
content: British Prime Minister Keir Starmer will hold an emergency meeting with police chiefs on Monday after days of violent anti-immigration protests intensified, with buildings and vehicles torched and hotels holding asylum seekers targeted.
summary: British Prime Minister Keir Starmer will hold an emergency meeting with police chiefs on Monday after days of violent anti-immigration protests intensified, with buildings and vehicles torched and hotels holding asylum seekers targeted.

title: UK's Honey Fraud Crises Explained: Beekeepers, Scientists Troubled
content: The practice of adulterating honey is well known, and historically adulterants such as ash and potato flour have been used. Now, advancements in technology and science have made it much easier, with "bespoke, designer or bioengineered" syrups.
summary: The practice of adulterating honey is well known, and historically adulterants such as ash and potato flour have been used. Now, advancements in technology and science have made it much easier, with "bespoke, designer or bioengineered" syrups.

title: "America's Most Wanted" Fugitive Found Working As A Cop In Mexico, Arrested
content: He was apprehended in Mexico, where he was working as a police officer, and handed over to deputy US Marshals in Mexico City.
summary: He was apprehended in Mexico, where he was working as a police officer, and handed over to deputy US Marshals in Mexico City.

title: China's Marriage Rate Lowest In 12 Years, Expected To Get Worse
content: The number of marriages in China is closely tied to the number of births, and the decline is likely to upset policymakers trying hard to boost the population which has been shrinking for two consecutive years.
summary: The number of marriages in China is closely tied to the number of births, and the decline is likely to upset policymakers trying hard to boost the population which has been shrinking for two consecutive years.

title: Indonesian Man Kills Neighbour Kept Asking Him Why He Was Not Married
content: The attacker, Parlindungan Siregar, was reportedly hurt and annoyed by the victim's persistent questioning about his marital status.
summary: The attacker, Parlindungan Siregar, was reportedly hurt and annoyed by the victim's persistent questioning about his marital status.

title: Kamala Harris To Name Her Veep Pick Today, Launch Swing State Tour
content: Kamala Harris will name her running mate as soon as Monday, as she prepares for a tour of US battleground states aimed at turning excitement over her presidential bid into durable support that can power her to victory.
summary: Kamala Harris will name her running mate as soon as Monday, as she prepares for a tour of US battleground states aimed at turning excitement over her presidential bid into durable support that can power her to victory.
